reformulated1: What specific technical methods have been proposed to detect and prevent copyright infringement in text-to-image diffusion models?
reformulated2: How have recent legal cases, such as those involving Stability AI and Getty Images, shaped the legal framework regarding copyright infringement by image generation models?
reformulated3: In what ways do few-shot generation and fine-tuning techniques like DreamBooth increase the risk of copyright infringement in AI-generated images, and what strategies exist to mitigate these risks?
